orig_text: a=acap:2 a=pcfg:1 t=1 a=1   ;Not allowed to embed "pcfg"
correct_text: a=acap:2 pcfg:1 t=1 a=1   ;Not allowed to embed "pcfg"
notes: The existing text, with "a=" before "pcfg", is outright syntactically incorrect per the syntax in the first paragraph of the section.  The correction is needed for the text to be the intended demonstration of a semantic error.

The example missed an S in the mine type. The list of allowed types is at https://www.iana.org/assignments/sdp-parameters/sdp-parameters.xhtml#sdp-parameters-2 and UDP/TLS/RTP/AVP  is not a registered device. Because this is over TLS, it is a SRTP (not RTP) and should use SAVP not AVP.
